summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5874 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South, from Graham Street to Rainier Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77356 as amended by Ordinance No. 77744, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
